structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS

law.catch_line: Certification of approved budget to state local finance officer.
law.text: Within fifteen (15) days after the budget is adopted by the fiscal court, the county judge/executive shall certify to the state local finance officer a copy of the original budget as approved by the state local finance officer, indicating clearly all changes made by the fiscal court.
law.history: Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 938q-14.
